Appointment started late due to emergency case which is completely understandable. 
Dr. Mugdha was very patient in listening to all FE stories I had to tell and understand my past history. Have always seen doctors sparing maximum 10-15 mins with a patient and here I found one who would listen to me for more than half an hour. Thank you for being so patient.

review: Dr. Mugdha assisted us with untimely pregnancy. She was so patient and listened to all our doubts, queries and misconceptions before recommending the treatment. Doctor was available 24/7 for any urgent calls or messages. We think we could not have found a better doctor and treatment.Personally recommendation for Dr. Mugdha Raut. Thanks.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
We had visited yesterday and consult Dr Mugdha Raut for my wife. It's been great meeting with her. 
We do continue at this clinic only. 
Unfortunately we did my wife's first pregnancy treatment at some other clinic but we have made up our mind that in future will definitely do with Dr Mugdha Raut's clinic only.  
Both Mr and Mrs Raut are amazing human being. We have impressed......

review:
The doctor always takes time with me, he answers all my questions and never seems to be in a rush to move on to the next patient. I always feel completely satisfied after my appointment. There are no unanswered questions, doubts, or confusion. You are a wonderful doctor ‚Äì I would not see anyone else.

Thanks,
Riddhi Namaye.
